title: Agricultural crop-hail insurance
dataVerified: Farm owner, crop type, acreage, coverage per acre, deductible
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/claimed). Link to insurer system (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake crop-hail insurance. Domain binding verifies insurer. Named-peril coverage (hail-specific). Prevents subsidy fraud. Adjuster verification of hail damage. Multi-peril crop insurance (MPCI) alternative.
